    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
if(jRadioButton1.isSelected()){
   String strul=jTextField1.getText();
    cryptography cr=new cryptography(strul);
    cr.setVisible(true);
    
    this.setVisible(false);
}
else
{ String strul=jTextField1.getText();
    NewJFrame1 nw=new NewJFrame1(strul);
    nw.setVisible(true);
    this.setVisible(false);
}

    }

    File f1,f15,f2;
    File f5;
    String f2path,ent,ent1,dc,ent2,ent4,abc,abc1,f15path;
    int e;
    File f6;
    File f7;
    int f,g;
    String f3path,fu;
    int y;

    public cryptography(String strul) {
        initComponents();
       jLabel3.setText("welcome :"+strul);
       Date dt=new Date();
       String po=dt.toString();
       jLabel2.setText(po);
      getContentPane().setBackground(Color.lightGray);
      Image img=Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("slide1.jpg");
      setIconImage(img);
     
      
    }

    private void encryptActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                        
  getContentPane().setBackground(Color.ORANGE);
  
        char[]ch=jPasswordField1.getPassword();
            System.out.println(ch);
             dc=new String(ch);
           if(ch.length==4){
        try{
   
  f2=new File(fpath);
  f15=new File(f15path);
               FileInputStream fr=new FileInputStream(f2);
                 
                  
 FileOutputStream fw=new FileOutputStream(f15);
            int[] a=new int[20];
            int[] b=new int[20];
            
          
             
           
            for (int j = 0; j <ch.length ; j++) {
             a[j]=ch[j];
             b[j]=a[j]+2;
             
             fw.write((byte) b[j] );
            }
                   
            System.out.println("aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa");
            
            len=(int)f2.length();
            
       
        byte[]ch1=new byte[len];    
 
    
            for (int i = 0; i < f2.length(); i++) {
                ch1[i]= (byte)(fr.read()+2);
               
                fw.write(ch1[i]);
            }
    
       
            System.out.println("bbbbbbbbbbbbbbbbb");
       
        
        fr.close();
        fw.close();
        JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(this, "file successfully encrypted","congratulations",JOptionPane.DEFAULT_OPTION);
        
        }
        
           catch(Exception e)
{
    System.out.println("error");
}  
             
             
           
     
           }     
        else
        {
            System.out.println("no. of characters should be equal to 4 only");
            JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(this,"no. of characters should be less than 4","WARNING",JOptionPane.OK_CANCEL_OPTION,JOptionPane.INFORMATION_MESSAGE);
            
        }
            
       
    
        
      // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                       
        
 
    private void jCheckBox1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                           
if(jCheckBox1.isSelected())
{
    jTextField2.setText(fpath);







    }                                          
    /**
     *
     * @throws IOException
    */
    }
    private void jMenuItem1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                           
                     fc=new JFileChooser();
          a=fc.showOpenDialog(this);
         System.out.println(a);
if(a==JFileChooser.APPROVE_OPTION){
    f1=fc.getSelectedFile();
 fpath=f1.getPath();
    System.out.println(fpath);// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                          
   in7=fpath.lastIndexOf(".");
   
   ent2=fpath.substring(in7);
    }
    private void jTextField2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                            
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                           
    
    private void jTextField1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                            
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                           

    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
                 fc=new JFileChooser();
                fc.setFileSelectionMode(JFileChooser.DIRECTORIES_ONLY);
        e=fc.showSaveDialog(this);
               
         System.out.println(e);
if(e==JFileChooser.APPROVE_OPTION){
    f6=fc.getSelectedFile();
 f2path=f6.getPath();
    System.out.println(f2path);
     
    abc=jTextField1.getText();
    abc1=abc.concat(ent2);
    jTextField1.setText(abc1);
    f15path=f2path.concat("\\"+abc1);// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        
    }
    private void jButton2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
       String strul=new String();
        NewJFrame1 m1= new NewJFrame1(strul);
        m1.setVisible(true);
        this.setVisible(false);// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    /**
     * @param args the command line arguments/

    public static void main(String args[]) {
     
 
                
        
        /* Set the Nimbus look and feel */

         */

            for (javax.swing.UIManager.LookAndFeelInfo info : javax.swing.UIManager.getInstalledLookAndFeels()) {
                if ("Nimbus".equals(info.getName())) {
                    javax.swing.UIManager.setLookAndFeel(info.getClassName());
                    break;
                }
            }
        } catch (ClassNotFoundException ex) {
            java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(cryptography.class.getName()).log(java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE, null, ex);
        } catch (InstantiationException ex) {
            java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(cryptography.class.getName()).log(java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE, null, ex);

            java.util.logging.Logger.getLogger(cryptography.class.getName()).log(java.util.logging.Level.SEVERE, null, ex);
        }
        //</editor-fold>

        java.awt.EventQueue.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
            public void run() {
                new cryptography().setvisible(true);
            }
        });

    }

import java.awt.Color;
import java.awt.Image;
import java.awt.Toolkit;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.FileOutputStream;

import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.FileWriter;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.logging.Level;

File f11,f12,f20;

int[]d=new int[10];
int[]z=new int[10];
char[]x=new char[10];
 byte[]ch6=new byte[4];
 String li;

      setIconImage(img);
    }

    private void jCheckBox1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                           
if(jCheckBox1.isSelected()){
    jTextField1.setText(f11path);// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                          
    }
    private void decryptActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                        
   getContentPane().setBackground(Color.pink);
        char[] ch4=jPasswordField1.getPassword();
            System.out.println(ch4);
             pc=new String(ch4);
             System.out.println("pc="+pc);
  try{
      
  
   FileInputStream  fr=new FileInputStream(f11);
    f20=new File(f20path);
   byte[] ch5=new byte[4];
     
        for (int i = 0; i<4; i++) {
           ch5[i]=(byte)fr.read();
          d[i]=ch5[i];
          z[i]=d[i]-2;
          
          
            System.out.println((byte)(z[i]) );
           
      
            ch6[i]=(byte)(z[i]);
        
        
        }
        li=new String(ch6);
        System.out.println("li="+li);
   
       
        
        System.out.println(pc.length());
        System.out.println(li.length());
        System.out.println(pc.equals(li));
       
        if(pc.equals(li))
        {
          FileOutputStream  fw=new FileOutputStream(f20);
               len1=(int)f11.length();
            
       
        byte[]ch11=new byte[len1];    
 
    
            for (int i = 4; i < f11.length(); i++) {
                ch11[i]= (byte)(fr.read()-2);
             
                fw.write(ch11[i]);
            }

JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(this,"file decrypted successfully","congratulations",JOptionPane.DEFAULT_OPTION,JOptionPane.INFORMATION_MESSAGE,null);
fr.close();
fw.close();

        }
        else
        {
            JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(this,"entered password for decryption  did not match the encrypted password","ERROR",JOptionPane.DEFAULT_OPTION );
        }
        
       
  }
        catch(Exception ex)
        {
            System.out.println(ex.getMessage());
        }
   
 // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                       

    private void jMenuItem1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                           
                    fc=new JFileChooser();
          a=fc.showOpenDialog(this);
         System.out.println(a);
if(a==JFileChooser.APPROVE_OPTION){
    f11=fc.getSelectedFile();
 f11path=f11.getPath();
    System.out.println(f11path);// TODO add your handling code here:
    } 
 in8=f11path.lastIndexOf(".");
   
   ent3=f11path.substring(in8);// TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                          

    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
                            fc=new JFileChooser();
                            fc.setFileSelectionMode(JFileChooser.DIRECTORIES_ONLY);
                            
          h=fc.showSaveDialog(this);
         System.out.println(a);
if(h==JFileChooser.APPROVE_OPTION){
    f12=fc.getSelectedFile();
 f12path=f12.getPath();
    System.out.println(f12path);
    
    pr=jTextField2.getText();
    pr1=pr.concat(ent3);
    jTextField2.setText(pr1);
   f20path=f12path.concat("//"+pr1);
    // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        
    }
    private void jTextField1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                            
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                           

    private void jButton2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
         String Strul=new String();
        cryptography cg=new cryptography(Strul); 
        cg.setVisible(true);
        this.setVisible(false);// TODO add your handling code here:
    }
